name: This is not Indiana Jones (Spanish)
description:
This is not Indiana Jones  is a game that I had to make in http://twinery.org/ for a project in a class. Because of that, it is all writen in Spanish, so it may not be for everyone.

In This is not Indiana Jones, you assume the role of Ondeani Jinas, a normal dude working at McDonalds. But one day you recieve a call about an interesting job in town. Make your own choices to see how the story ends!
